conversion_verification.notes: The model successfully represents the 2D floor plan as a 3D isometric cutaway.

3d_conversion_fundamentals.notes: Excellent 3D transformation with clear wall thickness, floor separation, and stable isometric perspective.

geometric_accuracy.notes: Room configuration and wall positions are highly accurate to the source. Door placements and window openings are consistent.

interior_elements.notes: Furniture placement is logical and matches the plan's layout; kitchen and bathroom fixtures are visible.

visual_clarity.notes: Clean rendering with no UI interference. Lighting is soft and even, providing good structural visibility.

detected_errors.description: Minor simplification of balcony details compared to the technical drawing.

summary: A highly faithful and geometrically accurate 3D transformation that preserves the structural integrity of the complex floor plan.
